name: Janos Isofidou
story: Janos Isofidou comes from a long line of military men. He joined the Greek army at a young age and rose through the ranks quickly due to his dedication and expertise in marksmanship. He was selected to join the special forces unit of his battalion and was later recruited to the OPFOR as a highly skilled marksman. Janos is fiercely loyal to his country, his comrades, and his family.
